C

canvas - Variable in class Window
The Canvas added to the StackPane, containing the used GraphicContext.
changeHeight(int) - Method in class Water
 
charFrame - Variable in class Game
This stores the avatar frame as it is displaying on screen.
charsName - Variable in class Game
This stores a character representation of the user's name input.
check() - Method in class Quiz
This method displays the screen with the results from the drag and drop game.
choice - Variable in class LevelSelect
The choice selected for the game level that the user wishes to play.
choice - Variable in class Menu
The chosen menu option.
clean() - Method in class Window
Draw a white rectangle covering entire GraphicContext.
colours - Variable in class DeviceLine
This 2 dimensional array stores a pixel by pixel representation of the DeviceLine image.
correct - Variable in class Learn
This stores whether the currently selected device (center-screen) is the correct match for the current description to be matched.
current - Variable in class Learn
This stores whether a description is being shown that must be matched, and if so then which one.
cWasher - Variable in class Quiz
This stores the washing machine device.
